scripts.build_cm30xx: rollup config/cm30xx_decoder_entry.js --file generated/cm30xx_decoder.js --validate && node html/post_process.js generated/cm30xx_decoder.js
scripts.build_um30xx: rollup config/um30xx_decoder_entry.js --file generated/um30xx_decoder.js --validate && node html/post_process.js generated/um30xx_decoder.js
scripts.build_ul20xx: rollup config/ul20xx_decoder_entry.js --file generated/ul20xx_decoder.js --validate && node html/post_process.js generated/ul20xx_decoder.js
